7 bed property for sale

£16,000,000 (£3,037/sq. ft)

Fraserburgh Hill, London SW3

7 5 4 5,269 sq. ft*

Interested in this property? Call 020 3463 0647 * or Request Details

* Calls to this number will be recorded for quality, compliance and training purposes.

Property features

  • First floor double reception room
  • Dining room
  • Kitchen
  • Master bedroom suite
  • Five further bedrooms
  • Four further bathrooms
  • Staff accommodation with separate facilities
  • Two terraces, private patio and access to a private rear garden
  • Lift
  • Comfort cooling

Property description



An exceptional six storey freehold home in Prime Central London.

Wonderfully laid out with beautiful entertaining space and well-proportioned rooms, this impressive family house has been refurbished to a very high standard, with the recent addition of a passenger lift. With its south-facing aspect the accommodation is extremely bright with a wealth of period features throughout.

Nb. In accordance with Section 21 of the Estate Agency Act 1979, we are obliged to inform you that the beneficiary of the Trust which owns this property is a Director of Henry & James (Estate Agents) Limited

Fraserburgh Hill is perfectly located for Knightsbridge, Chelsea and Belgravia and the abundance of excellent schools, restaurants, shopping and transport facilities that these areas have to offer
